We sincerely invite our Secretary, R. A. S. S. S. Somasundaram Sir, to be part of this occasion.

We are delighted to invite Mr. L. S. Vignesh Sir, Head of Artificial Intelligence, to our Association Function.
We invite Mr. Arunjothi Sir, Head of Information Technology, to this special occasion.
We take great pride in inviting Dr. J. Mathalai Raj Sir, Head of Computer Science and Engineering, to our Department Association Function.
